content:
132ikl said:

wait, how is this true if what florian linked above shows inlay hints working?

It's an extension that lsp-mode happens to support. If they get in LSP proper, every editor _should_ support them, and rust-analyzer will use the standard version.
i would like to note that in order to see inlay hints you also have to set lsp-rust-analyzer-server-display-inlay-hints to true
this is what i was missing in addition to just the lsp-rust-analyzer-inlay-hints-mode
actually, you only need that, it'll cause the mode to be activated
